Posts.Content: Jul 23, 2016 03:19PM NIKKIROSE wrote: I am starting chemo on Monday or Tuesday of this coming week. Diagnosed beginning of June and have gone through all the tests, Breast MRI, CT Scans, Bone Scan. Insurance wouldn't okay a PET or BRAIN scan which I am not happy about. Doctors recommending Chemo before surgery to try and shrink the 5cm mass. Hoping it works the way they want it to.
Posts.Title: Anyone starting chemo August 2016? MFalabella Kechla
